Category: Corporate Finance & Investment Banking (Banking & Financial Services)
Ad Text:
Senior Analyst, Investments Operating Model

At AustralianSuper, we truly care about our colleagues. We know work and life are intertwined. That’s why we support the diverse needs of everyone and have policies that enable us all to thrive and be truly flexible. We ensure diversity is celebrated for the opportunity it provides us all to learn and grow and deliver better outcomes for members.

Your New Role 

Are you ready to make a real impact in the Investments domain? 

As our new Senior Analyst, Investments Operating Model, you’ll be at the forefront of technology and operating model transformation, working across a wide range of asset classes and investment teams.  You’ll collaborate with stakeholders from a wide range of backgrounds, both internally and externally to formulate and deliver solutions that future-proof our organisation and protect the financial interests of our members.

You’ll leverage your broad understanding of technology solutions and architectures in Investments, with deep familiarity of the underlying architecture of platforms such as LUSID, Aladdin, Calypso, Bloomberg, iLevel or similar, together with strong understanding of Investment data flows, the different requirements of IBOR vs ABOR and both listed and unlisted assets. You’ll know how aggregated investment data views are built and set up robust, scalable operating models that support our strategic goals.

A researcher at heart, you’ll stay ahead of technology best practice by building strong relationships with vendors, competitors, and internal stakeholders. You’ll wear a project management hat to implement changes, drive continuous improvement, and ensure our operating model is agile, compliant, and ready for the future.

What You’ll Need

Broad understanding of technology solutions in the Investments domain, with hands-on experience across asset classes.
Familiarity with investment data flows, IBOR vs ABOR, and the architecture of platforms such as Aladdin, Calypso, Bloomberg, iLevel or similar.
A strong understanding of how risk is viewed in a large multi-asset manager environment and how to design future-proof technology and operating models.
Research-driven mindset, with a passion for staying abreast of technology best practice and industry trends.
Strong communication skills, with the ability to build relationships with vendors, competitors, and internal stakeholders.
Project management capability, able to implement changes that drive success and member value.
Experience working in Fund Management, Asset Management, Hedge Funds, or Investment Banking.
Tertiary qualification in business, commerce, finance, or a related discipline.
Team player, able to work effectively at all levels and influence others towards consensus.
Commitment to compliance, governance, and continuous improvement.
Creative, resilient, and collaborative approach, aligned with our Values and Members First culture.

Life at AustralianSuper 

AustralianSuper is committed to colleague development, and we support our people with ongoing learning, coaching and training, as well as career opportunities across our expanding global organisation. We offer generous leave entitlements and promote a blended working environment in which all roles can flex, and we’re happy to discuss what this looks like for you.

We cultivate a workplace that champions safety, respect, inclusiveness and diversity. We are committed to supporting our diverse workforce in a way that is inclusive and embraces diversity in all its forms. If you require any reasonable adjustments to the recruitment process or the role, please let our recruitment team know.

What’s Next 

If you’re ready to bring your energy, integrity, generosity of spirit and passion for excellent outcomes to a team that loves a challenge, apply now!

Australian or New Zealand citizenship or Australian permanent residency status is required.

Progress powered by purpose.

https://www.australiansuper.com/careers/candidate-privacy-notice

Agencies please note: this vacancy is being managed directly by AustralianSuper’s Talent Acquisition team. We will contact our preferred agency partners should we require additional support. Thank you.
